pages.text: $(o)"She rose out of suffering. This queen did not rise, but another king did, and this king is watching a dancer in a mirror woven out of a single thread. This queen awaits, still unsated, for a king to fall. She is always hungry."$()

pages.title: Symbol
pages.text: This symbol is created with a $(item)Rabbit's Foot$() in the $(l:glory/entry_rite_glorious)Glorious Rite$().$(br)When active, this deity will gnaw on $(t:The hunger bar of the players)the energy of all players$() nearby, converting it to Occult Energy.
